name: Ops Monitoring Platform
description: Real-time monitoring of network devices, servers, and virtualization parameters, collecting millions of metrics, providing flexible alert thresholds and alarm mechanisms for quick fault detection.
fullDescription: 基于Zabbix的分布式运维解决方案，实时监控网络设备、服务器、虚拟化等运行参数，采集百万级监控指标，提供灵活的告警阈值和报警机制，快速定位故障设备。

name: Online Quotation System
description: This is clearly a B2B international shipping/freight forwarding platform that helps businesses arrange cargo transport between China and international destinations.
fullDescription: 航运报价管理系统是一个为航运公司设计的综合平台，用于向客户提供准确的报价集中化费率管理，客户特定定价，自动在线计算，客户沟通管理

name: Shipping Quote Mobile
description: The Shipping Quote Mobile App is a powerful and user-friendly tool designed to streamline ocean freight rate inquiries and shipping cost estimations. Whether you are a freight forwarder, importer, exporter, or logistics provider, this app enables you to get instant and accurate shipping quotes anytime, anywhere.
fullDescription: 即时运费报价，快速获取全球航线的实时海运运费；个性化报价请求，根据货物信息，集装箱类型及运输需求定制精准报价；一键预订与跟踪，从报价到订舱、货运跟踪，全流程高效管理。

name: Echemi.com
description: Digital marketplace connecting chemical suppliers and buyers worldwide.
fullDescription: Echemi.com连接全球化学品供应商和买家，简化采购流程，同时确保全球化学品贸易的合规性、安全性和效率。主要功能包括，供应商-买家匹配系统，产品目录和规格管理，定价和交易管理，法规合规和文档管理，供应链可视化，质量保证和风险管理，市场情报
